quote: Money talks.
Actions speak louder than words.
A penny saved is a penny earned.
The early bird catches the worm.
A stitch in time saves nine.
Money talks, but it doesn't sing and dance and it doesn't walk.

There is no shortage of water in the desert but exactly the right amount, a perfect ratio of water to rock, of water to sand, insuring that wide free open, generous spacing among plants and animals, homes and towns and cities, which makes the arid West so different from any other part of the nation. There is no lack of water here unless you try to establish a city where no city should be.
Money talks, but you are holding up.
At the crossroads near the shore, there's a green oak tree;
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Find a job you love, and you'll never have to work a day in your life.
I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears, and sweat.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
Better to hold a goat, and the goat suddenly spoke.
Russians have such a word - 'soul.' We even say: he has a soul. It must be a misfortune to be without a soul.
The Russian spirit cannot be understood by the mind, nor measured by the common arshin. It has a special stature - Russia can only be believed in.
The story of a horse is like the story of a man.
If you look for perfection, you'll never be content.
My sadness is my happiness, the treasure of my heart, the mistress of my soul.
The muse of our northern Prophets.
All ages are submissive to love.
